name: EcoCart Sciences Inc.
description: Developer of sustainable shopping applications designed to make fighting climate change simple, cost-effective and accessible. The company's application calculates and eliminates the carbon footprint of online orders, pops a notification about participating stores and provides points that can be redeemed for gift cards or to make an important impact on the planet, enabling e-commerce brands and consumers to offset the environmental repercussions of their orders while shopping at their favorite stores.
